text: “‘If a man dedicates to Yahweh part of the field of his possession, then your valuation shall be according to the seed for it. The sowing of a homer27:16 1 homer is about 220 liters or 6 bushels of barley shall be valued at fifty shekels27:16 A shekel is about 10 grams or about 0.35 ounces. of silver.
